channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【EP182: Cookies vs Sessions】EP182：cookie vs sessions
item.description: 【Every web app needs a way to remember users after they log in, and the way they manage this makes a big difference in performance, scalability, and security of that web application.】每个Web应用程序都需要一种方法来记住用户登录后，并且他们管理此操作的方式对该Web应用程序的性能，可扩展性和安全性有很大的影响。

item.title: 【GraphQL 101: API Approach Beyond REST】GraphQL 101：API接近休息
item.description: 【In this article, we will start with the basic concepts of GraphQL, covering how it works and why it has become so popular. From there, we will look at different ways GraphQL can be used as part of system architecture, from simple deployments to large-scale environments.】在本文中，我们将从GraphQl的基本概念开始，涵盖它的工作原理以及为什么变得如此受欢迎。从那里开始，我们将研究GraphQL可以用作系统体系结构的一部分，从简单部署到大规模环境。

item.title: 【How Fine-Tuning Transforms Generic AI Models into Specialists】微调如何将通用AI模型转化为专家
item.description: 【In this article, we will understand how fine-tuning works at a conceptual level, the different approaches available, and breakthrough techniques like LoRA that have democratized access to AI customization.】在本文中，我们将了解微调如何在概念层面，可用的不同方法以及像Lora这样的突破性技术来使AI自定义访问民主化。

item.title: 【How RAG Enables AI For Your Data】RAG如何启用AI的数据
item.description: 【Large Language Models like GPT-4 and Claude have transformed the way we interact with computers.】GPT-4和Claude等大型语言模型已经改变了我们与计算机互动的方式。

item.title: 【How Meta Animates Billions of AI-generated Images】元如何使数十亿个AI生成的图像动画
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at how Meta implemented this feature and the challenges they faced.】在本文中，我们将研究Meta如何实施此功能以及它们面临的挑战。

item.title: 【EP181: How Java Works】EP181：Java如何工作
item.description: 【Ever wondered what happens behind the scenes when you run a Java program?】有没有想过当您运行Java程序时幕后会发生什么？

item.title: 【Understanding Load Balancers: Traffic Management at Scale】了解负载平衡器：大规模交通管理
item.description: 【When applications grow beyond a single server, they face the challenge of handling more users, more data, and more requests than one machine can manage.】当应用程序超越单个服务器时，他们面临着处理更多用户，更多的数据和更多请求的挑战，而不是一台计算机可以管理的挑战。

item.title: 【Become an AI Engineer | Learn by Doing | Cohort Based Course】成为AI工程师|通过做学习|基于队列的课程
item.description: 【After months of preparation, I’m thrilled to announce the launch of the very first cohort of Becoming an AI Engineer.】经过几个月的准备，我很高兴宣布成为AI工程师的第一个队列。

item.title: 【How Anthropic Built a Multi-Agent Research System】人类如何构建多代理研究系统
item.description: 【In this article, we will understand the architecture of the multi-agent research system that Anthropic built.】在本文中，我们将了解人类构建的多代理研究系统的架构。

item.title: 【How Linear Implemented Multi-Region Support For Customers】线性如何为客户实施多区域支持
item.description: 【In this article, we look at how Linear implemented multi-region support for its customers. We will explore the architecture they built, along with the technical implementation details.】在本文中，我们研究了如何为客户实施多区域支持。我们将探索他们构建的体系结构以及技术实施细节。
